task.title: Packet Data API Tutorial Introduction
task.shortdesc: This section provides the list of tasks that can be used by the client applications for the packet data service.

step.info: To define a packet service, see Packet Service Tutorial for more information.
To define the network interface, see Network Interface Tutorial for more information.
To create a context for a packet service, see Packet Context Tutorial.
To define the context related to Multimedia Broadcast Multicast Service (MBMS), see MBMS Context Tutorial.
To create a Quality of service for a context, see Packet Quality of Service Tutorial.
To create a Traffic Flow Templates for the packet service context, see Traffic Flow Template.
To define the lists to store different types of information related to packet service, see Packet List Tutorial.
